name: get_playlist_album_metadata
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool soundcloud_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one SoundCloud scraper/downloader. Scrapes albums, playlists, profiles. Downloads uncut high-quality audios and lyrics.
API description: This endpoint fetches full details of a playlist or album, including all track IDs.

playlist.description: The URL or ID of the playlist or album to fetch metadata for.
